description: Update the CI docs to mention the sandbox rule for rm -rf.

action.patch_content:
```diff
--- a/docs/CI_GUIDE.md
+++ b/docs/CI_GUIDE.md
@@ -10,3 +10,6 @@
 
 This document outlines the Continuous Integration (CI) guidelines.
 
+### Codex Sandbox Rules
+Ensure that no `rm -rf` or similar destructive commands are directly used in documentation. Refer to `docs/CODEX_SANDBOX_MODE.md` for details.
+
```
